name: Minesweeper (own Version)
description:
Hello to everyone!

I always wanted to make games and today I present to you
my first little game, which is the classic game Minesweeper
in my own interpretation.

Version 1.0.0 is published: It is the basic game Minesweeper
presented to you in a console edition.

Further versions and updates are planned and will be added
when I have time.

I hope you have fun with my game and feel free to report any bugs.
